properties.name: nww.vfs.root
properties.description: The virtual file system root path for this application.

properties.name: nww.host
properties.description: The url host part used for creating absolute urls.

properties.name: nww.tracking.piwik.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable the inclusion of Piwik tracking code

properties.name: nww.resources.messages.cachetime
properties.description: Time in seconds to cache localization resource bundles. Set to -1 to disable caching. Set to 0 to cache forever.

properties.name: nww.preferences.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable the users settings menu.

properties.name: nww.vfs.shared
properties.description: The virtual file system path for shared files like WYSIWYG editor uploads.

properties.name: nww.tour.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable the tour feature.
